text.p: Stockfeed producer Ridley Corp Ltd said on Tuesday it would extend its takover offer for maltster Joe White Maltings Ltd to November 8 from November 1.
Ridley is offering cash A$5.44 per share, made up of A$5.30 per share plus 14 cents per share dividend. (corrects terms)

Ridley had tried to raise the offer via the introduction of a scrip component, conditional on a favourable recomendation from the Joe White board. However on October 18, the Joe White board said such a recommendation would not be forthcoming.
